sections.summary: The Relationship Meter. It measures how strongly two assets move together. Range is from +1 (Perfect Positive) to -1 (Perfect Negative). Zero means no relationship. It is the backbone of portfolio construction and hedging.
sections.deep_dive: Correlation is not causation, but it is profit. If Bitcoin and the Nasdaq have a correlation of +0.9, trading them as separate assets is an illusion. You just doubled your risk. We use correlation to find true diversification.

sections.forecast_risks: Correlation is dynamic. Relationships change instantly. A hedge that worked yesterday (Stock vs. Bond) might fail today if inflation spikes (both fall together).", "gms_conclusion": "Don't put all your eggs in one basket. Correlation tells you if you are holding different baskets or just painted the same basket different colors."
